name: Thirukkural
0:
”Alexa, ask today's kural to tell me a kural”
”Alexa, open today's kural”
”Alexa, launch today's kural”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: today's kural
des:
Welcome to Thirukkural couplets. This skill allows you to learn thirukkural with explanation in both tamil and english language. You can invoke as many times to learn thirukkural couplets in random.

If you love this skill, please let us know by giving us your rating!

We'd love to hear from you! If you have questions, comments, or feedback, please e-mail us at encoreideas08@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
